archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.7a: a) defining applicable business processes and projects (e.g. the launch of a new product, assessment of a product provided by external suppliers, a transformation project or the provision of a continuous service to customers)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
